verses.roman:
āra yata loka saba cotarā-talāne
maṇḍalī-bandhe vasilā, tāra nā haya gaṇane

synonyms: āra—other; yata—as many as; loka—people; saba—all; cotarā-talāne—at the base of the platform; maṇḍalī-bandhe—in groups; vasilā—sat down; tāra—of them; nā haya gaṇane—there was no counting.
translation: All the other people sat in groups around the platform. No one could count how many people there were.
